1.title: Moses Reviews Journey
1.keyEvent: Moses recounts Israel's journey from Horeb

2.title: Journey Around Edom
2.keyEvent: Israel's route around Edom and Moab described

3.title: Conquest of Og
3.keyEvent: Defeat of King Og and land distribution east of Jordan

4.title: Exhortation to Obedience
4.keyEvent: Call to obey God's laws and avoid idolatry

5.title: The Ten Commandments
5.keyEvent: Moses repeats the Ten Commandments to Israel

6.title: The Great Commandment
6.keyEvent: Love God with all your heart and teach children

7.title: Destroy the Canaanites
7.keyEvent: Command to utterly destroy Canaanite nations

8.title: Remember the Lord
8.keyEvent: Remember God's provision in the wilderness

9.title: Rebellion and Mercy
9.keyEvent: Israel's rebellion and God's mercy recounted

10.title: New Tablets and God's Love
10.keyEvent: God gives new tablets; call to love and fear Him

11.title: Obedience and Blessings
11.keyEvent: Blessings for obedience and warnings against disobedience

12.title: Centralized Worship
12.keyEvent: Instructions for worship at the place God chooses

13.title: False Prophets
13.keyEvent: Warning against false prophets and idolatry

15.title: Year of Release
15.keyEvent: Sabbatical year and debt release commanded

16.title: Feasts and Justice
16.keyEvent: Instructions for feasts and appointing judges

17.title: Justice and Kings
17.keyEvent: Laws concerning judges, priests, and kings

18.title: Priests and Prophets
18.keyEvent: Provision for priests and promise of a prophet

19.title: Cities of Refuge
19.keyEvent: Establishment of cities of refuge for manslayers

21.title: Various Laws
21.keyEvent: Laws on captives, inheritance, and family matters

22.title: Miscellaneous Laws
22.keyEvent: Laws on lost property, kindness, and purity

23.title: Community Purity
23.keyEvent: Laws on exclusion from assembly and cleanliness

24.title: Social Justice Laws
24.keyEvent: Laws on divorce, loans, and fair treatment

25.title: Justice and Family
25.keyEvent: Laws on justice, levirate marriage, and honesty

26.title: Firstfruits and Tithes
26.keyEvent: Offering firstfruits and tithes to the Lord

27.title: Curses Pronounced
27.keyEvent: Instructions for blessings and curses on Mount Ebal

28.title: Blessings and Curses
28.keyEvent: Blessings for obedience and curses for disobedience

29.title: Renewal of Covenant
29.keyEvent: Renewal of covenant before entering the land

30.title: Choice of Life
30.keyEvent: Call to choose life by loving and obeying God

31.title: Moses' Final Charge
31.keyEvent: Moses commissions Joshua and writes the law

32.title: Song of Moses
32.keyEvent: Moses recites a song warning Israel

33.title: Blessing of Tribes
33.keyEvent: Moses blesses the twelve tribes of Israel

34.title: Death of Moses
34.keyEvent: Moses dies on Mount Nebo; Joshua succeeds him
